彪.definition: (literary) tiger stripes; (by extension) ornate and brightly colored; (by synecdoche) young tiger; (fig.) strong; stalwart; (old) classifier for troops

彪悍.definition: tough as nails; formidable; kick-ass; plucky

彪炳.definition: (literary) (of deeds, accomplishments etc) to shine brightly (in the annals of history etc); (literary) outstanding; splendid; glorious

彪煥.definition: brilliant and shining; outstanding and elegant
